User_Registration_Growth: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', created_at) AS registration_date, COUNT(user_id) AS user_count FROM users GROUP BY registration_date ORDER BY registration_date;
Geographical_Distribution: SELECT a.country, a.city, COUNT(DISTINCT u.user_id) AS user_count FROM users u JOIN addresses a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.is_default = TRUE GROUP BY a.country, a.city;
Customer_Lifetime_Value: SELECT u.user_id, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_revenue FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id;
Customer_Retention_Rate: WITH first_orders AS (SELECT user_id, MIN(order_date) AS first_order_date FROM orders GROUP BY user_id), repeat_users AS (SELECT user_id FROM orders WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM first_orders) AND order_date > (SELECT first_order_date FROM first_orders WHERE user_id = orders.user_id)) SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT repeat_users.user_id) * 100.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT first_orders.user_id) AS retention_rate FROM first_orders LEFT JOIN repeat_users ON first_orders.user_id = repeat_users.user_id;
Top_selling_Products: SELECT p.product_id, SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM order_items oi JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC LIMIT 10;
Revenue_per_Category: SELECT c.category_id, c.name, SUM(o.total_amount) AS total_revenue FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id GROUP BY c.category_id, c.name;
Average_Product_Rating: SELECT p.product_id, AVG(r.rating) AS average_rating FROM products p LEFT JOIN reviews r ON p.product_id = r.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id;
Product_View_to_Purchase_Ratio: WITH product_purchases AS (SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_purchased FROM order_items GROUP BY product_id), product_views AS (SELECT product_id, COUNT(view_id) AS total_views FROM product_views GROUP BY product_id) SELECT pv.product_id, (pp.total_purchased * 1.0 / pv.total_views) AS conversion_ratio FROM product_purchases pp JOIN product_views pv ON pp.product_id = pv.product_id;
Total_Sales: SELECT SUM(total_amount) AS total_sales FROM orders;
Average_Order_Value: SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS average_order_value FROM orders;
Basket_Size: SELECT AVG(quantity) AS average_basket_size FROM order_items;
Order_Conversion_Rate: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) FROM orders) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) FROM users) AS conversion_rate;
Monthly_Sales_Growth: WITH monthly_sales AS (SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', order_date) AS month, SUM(total_amount) AS sales FROM orders GROUP BY month ORDER BY month) SELECT m1.month, ((m2.sales - m1.sales) / m1.sales) * 100 AS growth_rate FROM monthly_sales m1 JOIN monthly_sales m2 ON m2.month = m1.month + INTERVAL '1 month';
Payment_Method_Popularity: SELECT payment_method, COUNT(payment_id) AS payment_count FROM payments GROUP BY payment_method;
Average_Payment_Time: SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (p.payment_date - o.order_date))) AS average_payment_time_seconds FROM payments p JOIN orders o ON p.order_id = o.order_id;
Average_Delivery_Time: SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (s.shipment_date - o.order_date))) AS average_delivery_time_seconds FROM shipments s JOIN orders o ON s.order_id = o.order_id;
Top_viewed_Products: SELECT product_id, COUNT(view_id) AS view_count FROM product_views GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY view_count DESC LIMIT 10;
View_to_Purchase_Conversion_Rate: WITH product_purchases AS (SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_purchased FROM order_items GROUP BY product_id), product_views AS (SELECT product_id, COUNT(view_id) AS total_views FROM product_views GROUP BY product_id) SELECT pv.product_id, (pp.total_purchased * 1.0 / pv.total_views) AS conversion_ratio FROM product_purchases pp JOIN product_views pv ON pp.product_id = pv.product_id;
Product_View_Trends: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day', view_date) AS view_date, COUNT(view_id) AS view_count FROM product_views GROUP BY view_date ORDER BY view_date;
Order_Status_Distribution: SELECT status, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY status;
